query:
SELECT d.codigo, d.nome, COUNT(DISTINCT cd.cursoId) as total_cursos
FROM disciplinas d
JOIN cursosDisciplinas cd ON d.id = cd.disciplinaId
WHERE d.codigo = 'COM100'
GROUP BY d.id, d.codigo, d.nome;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Q6CVQSvv4vsSx3.a0e54a3010e2 --database AgAQ7M7gXFHDiuyXgHyZLe --execute SELECT d.codigo, d.nome, COUNT(DISTINCT cd.cursoId) as total_cursos
FROM disciplinas d
JOIN cursosDisciplinas cd ON d.id = cd.disciplinaId
WHERE d.codigo = 'COM100'
GROUP BY d.id, d.codigo, d.nome;
